plot: Presenter Joe Mace introduces a 20 week series showcasing the hottest artists in today's music scene. There are also exclusive interviews with the bands and a run-down of the UK chart's Top 20 albums.
plot_en: Presenter Joe Mace introduces a 20 week series showcasing the hottest artists in today's music scene. There are also exclusive interviews with the bands and a run-down of the UK chart's Top 20 albums.
plot_es: Presenter Joe Mace introduces a 20 week series showcasing the hottest artists in today's music scene. There are also exclusive interviews with the bands and a run-down of the UK chart's Top 20 albums.
title: The Album Chart Show
